script:
1). What did the supervisor have for dinner?
I think he ordered the pasta. 
He told me to type the report.
At six p.m. in the dining hall
2). Aren't you supposed to be at the staff meeting?
Yes, it's in the conference room.
No, I have to finish writing this article. 
Down the hall, third door on the right.
3). Zeus Inc. has announced it's buying Mercury Tech.
She said she would start soon.
I'm not that surprised. 
Yes, they're on 3rd Avenue.
